casebody.data:
Erick Daniel DAVILA, petitioner,
v.
Lorie DAVIS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 16-6219. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 27, 2017.

Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted, and Seth Kretzer, Esquire, of Houston, Texas, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioner in this case.
